content: HMM! I'd love to make hats for the creatures here.

content: Here, you don't need to dive to explore the world beneath the water.

content: {A看我的}I've made hats for birds, cats, calves, lambs, and puppies before. HMM! I'm quite experienced, you see! But the creatures here don't know me yet... they run off as soon as they see me.
info: 日常对话-日常闲聊-邀约玩法-在水族馆-1011多杰朗_邀约

content: {A远眺}HMM! The underwater world is so peaceful. The fish you've placed here seem completely free, as if no glass could ever hold them.
